description.value:
You drink your adaptation serums, a unique brew intended to protect you from extreme conditions which you gain as a secondary tool. For the next hour, you gain one of the following effects, chosen when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-actions.Item.Wagb9XE34NpQQ8yy]{Reinforce your Arsenal}.

You treat severe or extreme cold as mild cold, and you treat incredible cold as severe cold. You treat severe or extreme heat as mild heat, and you treat incredible heat as severe heat.

Reinforced For the duration, you also gain resistance equal to your level to damage of any of the trophy's damage types dealt by hazardous terrain or by an effect that would damage you upon entering or starting your turn in a particular area, such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Toxic Cloud} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}.
